labels.analysis: The MCP Server provides real-time and historical financial market data through Twelve Data's API, offering a suite of analytical tools for price tracking, technical indicators, and trend analysis. It caters to financial analysts, traders, and applications requiring market insights by offering precise metrics like moving averages, RSI, Bollinger Bands, ADX, ATR, and support/resistance levels. Its primary purpose is to empower financial workflows with actionable market data and technical analysis capabilities.
labels.reasoning: The server's core functionality aligns most closely with "Financial Services" due to its focus on real-time financial data, technical indicators, and market analysis. "Data Analysis & Processing" is a secondary label given its extensive computational tools for deriving metrics from financial data. No custom label is needed as the predefined categories sufficiently cover the server's scope.

server_info_crawled.name: Twelve Data Financial Data Server
server_info_crawled.author: @AlmogAdziashvili/twelve-data-mcp-server
server_info_crawled.overview: Provide real-time financial data and technical indicators from the Twelve Data API to enhance your financial analysis workflows. Access current prices, trend analysis, volatility metrics, and support/resistance levels seamlessly within your LLM applications. Empower your agents with comprehensive market insights and pattern recognition capabilities.

tools.name: GetRealTimePrice
tools.description: Deploy Server Twelve Data Financial Data Server @AlmogAdziashvili/twelve-data-mcp-server Try in Playground GetRealTimePrice

tools.name: GetTimeSeries
tools.description: Get the historical time series price data of an instrument. try to keep the output size as small as possible. No need to display the entire list of values unless the user asks for it.

tools.name: GetMovingAverage
tools.description: Get the moving average (MA, SMA) of an instrument

tools.name: GetRelativeStrengthIndex
tools.description: Get the relative strength index (RSI) of an instrument

tools.name: GetBollingerBands
tools.description: Get the bollinger bands of an instrument

tools.name: GetAverageDirectionalIndex
tools.description: Get the average directional index (ADX) of an instrument

tools.name: GetAverageTrueRange
tools.description: Get the average true range (ATR) of an instrument

tools.name: GetSupportResistance
tools.description: Get the support and resistance levels of an instrument. Period is the number of days to look back, the default is 100 days.

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@AlmogAdziashvili/twelve-data-mcp-server/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())

smithery_configuration_requirements.name: apiKey
smithery_configuration_requirements.description: Twelve Data API key to authenticate requests against Twelve Data API.
